page.title: 09Bideford:S+SE.Farm Data.
page.content: The vertical columns, in order, are:how long in the same family,no.of acres,no. of workers(incl.family),4 wheel tract- ors,other tractors,dairy animals(incl. young),beef animals,ewes,lambs,pigs, poultry(incl.geese),corn acres, silage acres,hay acres,acres of kale/roots,etc The farms,in order of appearance in the table are:Tennacott,Oldiscleave,Pillmou -th,Little Ashridge,Ashridge ,Bowden. |12|630|4|1|3|100|150|250|1000| 0| 0| 250| 80| 45| 80| |60|196|2|1|1| 0|100|130| 160| 0| 36| 30| 35| 15| 18| | 8|166|3|1|3| 0| 50|100| 0| 12| 0| 69| 0| 20| 12| |60|240|3|1|1|120| 5|60 sheep| 0| 0| 28|200| 5| 0| 200|120|2|0|2| 79| 0| 0| 0| 0| 0| 30| 45| 0| 0| |22|135|2|1|3|143|few| 0| 0| 0| 0| 26| 70| 0| 10|
